snippet: Mary McGowan Davis, a former New York State Supreme Court justice, was picked to lead the panel’s work to completion a day after its chairman resigned.
abstract: United Nations Human Rights Council names Mary McGowan Davis, former justice of New York State Supreme Court, to serve on panel's inquiry into possible war crimes in Gaza in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Mary McGowan Davis, a former New York State Supreme Court justice, was picked to lead the panel’s work to completion a day after its chairman resigned.

headline.main: U.N. Names U.S. Judge to Lead War Crimes Inquiry Into 2014 Gaza Conflict
headline.print_headline: New Head of Gaza Inquiry Is Named

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
